availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
State of Indiana
Parke County ss.

I, Geo W Thompson Commissioner of Deed appointed by the Govenor of the State of Kentucky for the State of Indiana do solemnly swear that I will well and truly execute and perform all the duties of such commissioner
George. W. Thompson. subscribed & sworn to before the undersigned Notary Public within and for said county this 16th day of November 1860.
In witness whereof I have hereunto set my hand and affixed my notarial seal the date above written
Wm P. Bryant Jr Notary Public
State of Indiana. Parke County. SS.

I, Wm P Bryant Notary Public duly appointed and commissioned by the Govenor of the state of Indiana for said county certify that the foregoing is a true copy of the oath of Geo W Thompson adminstered by me and endorsed in his Commission

figure.ab:
W. P. BRYANT.
NOTARY PUBLIC
PARKE COUNTY, IND.

body.p: Witness my hand and Notarial seal this 16th day of November 1860.

Wm P. Bryant Jr
Notary Public

Indiana
Oath
Geo. W. Thompson
Comr of Deeds
Filed Nov 22d 1860
